data.name: sqlScriptForNewDatabase
data.value: /****** Object: Database [95] Script Date: 1/18/2022 8:36:02 AM ******/ CREATE DATABASE [95] CONTAINMENT = NONE ON PRIMARY ( NAME = N'95', FILENAME = N'AddressFileForSave\95.mdf' , SIZE = 8192KB , MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 65536KB ) LOG ON ( NAME = N'95_log', FILENAME = N'AddressFileForSave\95_log.ldf' , SIZE = 8192KB , MAXSIZE = 2048GB , FILEGROWTH = 65536KB ) GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET COMPATIBILITY_LEVEL = 140 GO IF (1 = FULLTEXTSERVICEPROPERTY('IsFullTextInstalled')) begin EXEC [95].[dbo].[sp_fulltext_database] @action = 'enable' end GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ANSI_NULLS OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ANSI_PADDING OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ANSI_WARNINGS OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ARITHABORT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET AUTO_CLOSE ON GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET AUTO_SHRINK OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS ON GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET CURSOR_DEFAULT GLOBAL GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET RECURSIVE_TRIGGERS OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ENABLE_BROKER GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS_ASYNC OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET DATE_CORRELATION_OPTIMIZATION OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET TRUSTWORTHY OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ALLOW_SNAPSHOT_ISOLATION OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET PARAMETERIZATION SIMPLE GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT ON GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET HONOR_BROKER_PRIORITY OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET RECOVERY SIMPLE GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET MULTI_USER GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET PAGE_VERIFY CHECKSUM GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET DB_CHAINING OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET FILESTREAM( NON_TRANSACTED_ACCESS = OFF ) GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET TARGET_RECOVERY_TIME = 60 SECONDS GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET DELAYED_DURABILITY = DISABLED GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET QUERY_STORE = OFF GO USE [95] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[__MigrationHistory] Script Date: 1/18/2022 8:36:02 AM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[__MigrationHistory]( [MigrationId] [nvarchar](150) NOT NULL, [ContextKey] [nvarchar](300) NOT NULL, [Model] [varbinary](max) NOT NULL, [ProductVersion] [nvarchar](32) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.__MigrationHistory] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [MigrationId] ASC, [ContextKey] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[ApplicationUsers] Script Date: 1/18/2022 8:36:02 AM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ApplicationUsers]( [UserId] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [UserName] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [UserPassword] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [FullName] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, [Editor] [nvarchar](10) NOT NULL, [LimetedCompany] [bit] NOT NULL, [Enabled] [bit] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.ApplicationUsers] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [UserId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[BankAccNums] Script Date: 1/18/2022 8:36:02 AM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[BankAccNums]( [ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [FullName] [nvarchar](150) NOT NULL, [BankName] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [AccNumber] [nvarchar](15) NULL, [AccCart] [nvarchar](19) NULL, [AccISBN] [nvarchar](26) NULL, [Editor] [nvarchar](150) NULL, [CenterID_FK] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.BankAccNums] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Cashes] Script Date: 1/18/2022 8:36:02 AM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Cashes]( [CashID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [QueueID_FK] [int] NOT NULL, [Pos] [int] NULL, [CashDesk] [int] NULL, [userID] [tinyint] NOT NULL, [seriesID_FK] [int] NOT NULL, [CenterID_FK] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.Cashes] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [CashID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Centers] Script Date: 1/18/2022 8:36:02 AM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Centers]( [ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [CenterTitle] [nvarchar](300) NOT NULL, [TokenKey] [nvarchar](450) NOT NULL, [Description] [nvarchar](300) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.Centers] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Cleams] Script Date: 1/18/2022 8:36:02 AM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Cleams]( [ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Commissions] Script Date: 1/18/2022 8:36:02 [datetime] NOT NULL, [enabled] [bit] NOT NULL, [Groups_FK] [tinyint] NOT NULL, [GroupID] [tinyint] NOT NULL, [CenterID_FK] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.Commissions] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [CommissionID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [LastName] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [PhoneNumber] [nvarchar](10) NULL, [SmartCart] [int] NOT NULL, [TagNumber] [nvarchar](15) NOT NULL, [Tag] [nvarchar](15) NOT NULL, [editor_FK] [tinyint] NULL, [driver_code] [int] NULL, [GroupID] [tinyint] NOT NULL, [userID_FK] [tinyint] NOT NULL, [CenterID_FK] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.Drivers] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DriverID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[People]( [ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [PersonID] [int] NOT NULL, [FName] [nvarchar](150) NOT NULL, [LName] [nvarchar](250) NOT NULL, [FatherName] [nvarchar](100) NULL, [Tavalod] [datetime] NOT NULL, [CodeMelei] [nvarchar](11) NOT NULL, [Takalof] [tinyint] NOT NULL, [SerialShenasnameh] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [Shenasnameh] [nvarchar](11) NULL, [MahelTavalod] [nvarchar](100) NULL, [Hoshmand] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [Sh_Bimeh] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [Sh_Goyahinameh] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [HoshmandNavgan] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [Sh_Plak] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [Kamion] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [Sh_Sokht] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [Tel] [nvarchar](11) NULL, [Mobile1] [nvarchar](11) NULL, [Mobile2] [nvarchar](11) NULL, [CodePosti] [nvarchar](10) NULL, [Address] [nvarchar](250) NULL, [IsActive] [bit] NOT NULL, [IsDelete] [bit] NOT NULL, [DateRegister] [datetime] NOT NULL, [UserID_FK] [int] NOT NULL, [PersonImg] [varbinary](max) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.People] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[PhoneBooks] Script Date: 1/18/2022 8:36:02 AM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [nvarchar](10) NULL, [Addres] [nvarchar](150) NULL, [postalCode] [nvarchar](10) NULL, [Jobs] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [Description] [nvarchar](150) NULL, [DriverID_FK] [int] NULL, [CenterID_FK] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.PhoneBooks] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON data.name: ScriptMenu
data.value:
use 95
insert into MenuGroups (MenuGroupTitle,Description) Values('DocumentRibbonPage','اسناد') insert into MenuGroups (MenuGroupTitle,Description) Values('ReportRibbonPage','گزارشات') insert into MenuGroups (MenuGroupTitle,Description) Values('SmsRibbonPage','سامانه پیام کوتاه') insert into MenuGroups (MenuGroupTitle,Description) Values('ManageRibbonPage','مدیریت نرم افزار')
insert into MenuItems (GroupID_FK,ItemTitel,Description) Values (1,'PersonPageGroup','رانندگان انجمن') insert into MenuItems (GroupID_FK,ItemTitel,Description) Values (1,'Person2PageGroup','رانندگان') insert into MenuItems (GroupID_FK,ItemTitel,Description) Values (2,'ReportsRibbonPageGroup','گزارشات') insert into MenuItems (GroupID_FK,ItemTitel,Description) Values (2,'BillReportsRibbonPageGroup','نوبت دهی') insert into MenuItems (GroupID_FK,ItemTitel,Description) Values (3,'SendSmsRibbonPageGroup','پیام کوتاه')
insert into Cleams (GroupID_FK,IsDelete,UserID_FK,MenuItemID_FK) values (1,0,1,1) insert into Cleams (GroupID_FK,IsDelete,UserID_FK,MenuItemID_FK) values (1,0,1,2) insert into Cleams (GroupID_FK,IsDelete,UserID_FK,MenuItemID_FK) values (2,0,1,3) insert into Cleams (GroupID_FK,IsDelete,UserID_FK,MenuItemID_FK) values (2,0,1,4) insert into Cleams (GroupID_FK,IsDelete,UserID_FK,MenuItemID_FK) values (3,0,1,5)
